thread.title: Fry Up This Super-Easy Chicken Dish from ‘Fuck, That’s Delicious’
thread.title_full: Fry Up This Super-Easy Chicken Dish from ‘Fuck, That’s Delicious’

author: Munchies Staff
title: Fry Up This Super-Easy Chicken Dish from ‘Fuck, That’s Delicious’
text:
Fry Up This Super-Easy Chicken Dish from ‘Fuck, That’s Delicious’ January 11, 2017 / 10:00 am By Munchies Staff 
Did you catch the new episode of Fuck, That’s Delicious that aired on our little old cable channel VICELAND last week? In case you missed it, we took yet another tour of host Action Bronson’s favorite city: None other than New York. Duh. 
In Queens, we visited Tony’s Beechhurst, a bona fide institution and maybe the best Italian deli on this side of the Atlantic. In addition to learning how to make some really badass penne alla vodka , we also made off with this crazy-simple recipe for fried chicken with potatoes and peppers. 
No, it’s not deep-fried chicken, so don’t expect that spicy, crunchy crust that might be popping up in your head. Think more like stir-fried, but with peppers for oomph and potatoes to take away all your winter chills.
